q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the sewing tasks assigned to the "Elite Sewers" group that are scheduled to start before June 30, 2024. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 31      | May 26, 2024     | June 4, 2024     | 260            | 260              | 1      |

It looks like the "Elite Sewers" have a task starting on May 26, 2024, and it's already completed! ğŸ‰ If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Elite Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Elite Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT * FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '10' AND start_time < '2024-06-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks assigned to the working group "Elite Sewers" with a start time before June 30, 2024
